question.body: True or False: Skeletal muscle is long, cylinder shaped, striated, and multi-nucleate.

response.feedback: Correct. These are characteristics of skeletal muscle only.
Incorrect. All of these characteristics are true of skeletal muscle.

question.body: True or False: Tendons are important structures in the muscular system because they connect bones together for stability.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Tendons are part of the muscular system but ligaments connect bones together, tendons join muscles to bones.
Correct. While tendons are part of the muscular system, they connect muscles to bones not bone to bone.
